author: LAWC

review: I really like the idea of Chromecast.As other users have said, instead of just mirroring your screen, it uses the Chromecast to access content from the internet and play it on your TV. You can disconnect your device and the content will keep playing.Because Chromecast does not have any sort of interface and cannot be controlled with a remote, your phone / tablet / computer works as a controller. You use your device to queue up content or launch an application, than chomecast plays it and you are free to do whatever with your phone.I find it especially useful for Pandora. I will launch the Pandora app on my iPhone and play it from my TV. The sound is much better than, however Pandora still runs off your phone if you do this.I can't wait for more functionality to be added to this device. It seems like Google could continue to improve this and make it into an amazing product. Right now I don't use it that much because I have Amazon Prime (which it does NOT support). Hopefully in the future support for this will be added.Overall great product even if slightly limited on functionality.
